attributes.action: create a mark for goods and products from the various countries within the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is believed that as Scotland wants to be independent it should be required to have its own mark saying it is scottish when sold in the rest of the UK. This should also be a requirement of english and welsh goods. Just as the 5 million in Scotland may want to buy scottish; the 50 million in England may want to buy english. This would also be a requirement of any goods produced in Wales as the 3 million Welsh people may want to buy goods produced in Wales.
